title: Life is Strange: True Colors - Deluxe Edition
description: Get the Deluxe Edition to play as Steph in the all-new story 'Wavelengths' (September 30), plus 4 exclusive Life is Strange hero outfits. A bold new era of the award-winning Life is Strange begins, with an all-new playable lead character and a thrilling mystery to solve! Alex Chen has long suppressed her 'curse': the supernatural ability to absorb and manipulate the strong emotions of others. When her brother dies, in a so-called accident, Alex must embrace this psychic power of Empathy to get to the truth. View emotions as blazing, colored auras: change fate and change lives. Freely roam the streets, stores, and hidden spaces of Haven Springs. Build trust with the townsfolk – and embrace friendship or romance with Ryan and Steph. Decide Alex's style, with up to 24 outfits.
